TABLE.NAME: logic
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the logic activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course module.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: logicexpressions
FIELD.COMMENT: The logic expressions field.

FIELD.NAME: logictool
FIELD.COMMENT: The logic tool for the module activity.

TABLE.NAME: logic_problem_bank
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the data associated with the problem bank.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the logic problem bank.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identity of user working on the problembank.

FIELD.NAME: course_id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: cm_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The course module instance id.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: logictool
FIELD.COMMENT: The logic tool for the problem bank.

FIELD.NAME: problemidstring
FIELD.COMMENT: A CSV string indicating which problems are in the problem bank.

FIELD.NAME: submitted
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the student has submitted the problem bank for grading.

TABLE.NAME: logic_problem
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the data associated with the problem.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the logic problem.

FIELD.NAME: atomicvariables
FIELD.COMMENT: The string containing the atomic variables. Note: their order is important for attempt:atomicvariablesint.

FIELD.NAME: logicexpressions
FIELD.COMMENT: The concatenated logicexpressions associated with the problem.

TABLE.NAME: logic_ttable_attempt
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the data associated with an attempt to solve a truth table problem.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the truth table problem.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Identity of user working on the problembank.

FIELD.NAME: problemid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the problem being attempted.

FIELD.NAME: problemexpression
FIELD.COMMENT: The concatenated logicexpression under evaluation.

FIELD.NAME: atomicvariablesvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: The string representing the values of the atomic variables.

FIELD.NAME: inputvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: The value input for the logic expression for the given interpretation. -1 => noinput; 0 => F; 1 => T.

FIELD.NAME: correctvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: The correct value of the logic expression evaluated for the given interpretation.
